convertRules:
# have fun converting!
'Defi |' -> 'Definition |\n\n: '

'Prop |' -> '**Proposition |**: '
'Lemm |' -> '**Lemma |**: '
'Theo |' -> '**Theorem |**: '

'Rem |' -> '**Remark**: |'
'Obj |' -> '**Objection**: |'
'Def |' -> '**Defense**: |'

# Selection Insert Rules
'"'  -> '"' + '"'
'<'  -> '<' + '>'
'~'  -> '~' + '~'
